<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reanimating Spark](/Feats.aspx?ID=3354) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 65

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
You have the [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11) condition and are about to attempt a recovery check.

</column>

---

The magic that animates you strains to keep you alive. You're restored to 1 Hit Point, lose the dying and [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) conditions, and can act normally on this turn. You gain or increase the [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition as normal when losing the dying condition in this way.
name: Reanimating Spark
